PhysicsEnemy Constructor
Create a new graphical enemy and start his movements

Parameters:
id - - (String) the enemy's identifier
world - - (GraphicalWorld) the graphical world in whitch the enemy is created
speed - - (int) the enemy's movement's speed
mass - - (int) the enemy's mass
model - - (Node) the model to attach to the enemy
